deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?

homeSubtitle: Showcase your coding projects and connect with developers
homeWhatIsDescription: CodeFolio is a full-stack portfolio and social platform for developers and creators. Built using the MEVN stack (MongoDB, Express, Vue 3, Bun), it allows users to showcase projects, receive feedback, and interact with a like-minded community. It includes multi-modal authentication, real-time features, rich project pages, a nested comment system, and strong security.
homeFrontendDesc: Vue 3, Composition API, Vuetify, Vite, SPA Routing
homeBackendDesc: Bun, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, RESTful API
homeSecurityDesc: OAuth, JWT RS256, Encrypted keys, Secure cookies
notificationsEmptyDescription: We'll notify you when something happens
title: Title
validationEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validationNameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validationNameMaxLength: Name must be less than 50 characters
validationNameInvalid: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
validationUsernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
validationUsernameMaxLength: Username must be less than 30 characters
validationUsernameInvalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
validationPasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validationPasswordMaxLength: Password must be less than 128 characters
validationPasswordRequirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
validationTitleMinLength: Title must be at least 3 characters
validationTitleMaxLength: Title must be less than 100 characters
validationDescriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
validationDescriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 500 characters
tourWelcome: üéâ Welcome to CodeFolio! This guided tour will show you all the amazing features of our developer portfolio platform. Let's get started!
tourLogoBrand: üè† This is the CodeFolio logo - click it anytime to return to the home page.
tourThemeToggle: üåôüí° Toggle between light and dark themes to match your preference. The theme is automatically saved!
tourLanguageSwitcher: üåç Switch between English and Vietnamese languages. Perfect for international developers!
tourHomeNav: üè† Navigate to the home page to see featured projects and platform overview.
tourProjectsNav: üìÅ Browse all projects from the community. You can search, filter, and sort projects here.
tourProjectsPageWelcome: üìÅ Welcome to the Projects page! Here you can discover amazing projects from the developer community.
tourProjectsSearch: üîç Search for projects by title, description, tags, or author name. Find exactly what you're looking for!
tourProjectTypeFilter: üìÇ Filter projects by type: Web Development, Mobile Apps, APIs, Games, Design, Data Science, and more!
tourProjectSort: üìä Sort projects by newest first, most viewed, or highest rated to discover trending content.
tourProjectCards: üíº Browse through project cards. Each shows the title, description, author, and tags. Click any card to view details!
tourProjectDetailWelcome: üìã Project Details Page - Here you can explore the project in depth and interact with the community.
tourProjectHeader: üìã Project details including title, description, author, and tags. Click the author name to visit their profile!
tourProjectVoting: üëçüëé Vote on projects! Upvote great projects and downvote if needed. Your votes help the community discover quality content.
tourGithubLink: üêô View the project on GitHub to see the source code, contribute, or star the repository.
tourProjectContent: üìù Detailed project content with rich formatting. Learn about implementation details, features, and technical insights.
tourGithubStats: üìà View GitHub statistics including stars, forks, and issues. See how popular the project is in the open-source community.
tourProjectDetails: üìÖ Project metadata including creation date, last update, and view count. Track the project's activity and popularity.
tourCommentsSection: üí¨ Join the discussion! Add comments, ask questions, or provide feedback. You can also mention other users with @username.
tourHomeHero: üöÄ Welcome to CodeFolio! This is where developers showcase their projects and connect with the community.
tourFeaturedProjects: ‚≠ê Featured projects section highlights the best work from our community. Discover amazing projects here!
tourPlatformOverview: üèóÔ∏è Learn about the platform's features: modern frontend, secure backend, and robust security measures.
tourLoginButton: üîê Sign in to access all features including creating projects, commenting, and following other developers.
tourRegisterButton: üìù New to CodeFolio? Create an account to start sharing your projects and connecting with other developers.
tourNotifications: üîî Check your notifications here. You'll get notified about new followers, comments, and project updates.
tourUserMenu: üë§ Access your profile, manage your account, and logout from here.
tourProfileHeader: üë§ Your profile header displays your avatar, name, username, bio, and contact information. Make it stand out!
tourFollowStats: üë• Follow and be followed! Click on follower/following counts to see the full list. Build your developer network.
tourEditProfileBtn: ‚úèÔ∏è Edit your profile to update your information, change your avatar, or modify your bio.
tourAddProjectBtn: ‚ûï Add new projects to showcase your work! Include detailed descriptions, GitHub links, and cover images.
tourExportPdf: üìÑ Export your profile as a PDF for sharing with employers, clients, or for your personal records.
tourResetPassword: üîí Reset your password securely using email verification. Keep your account safe!
tourMyProjects: üíº Your projects section shows all the work you've shared. Edit or delete projects, and see how they perform.
tourAdminNav: ‚öôÔ∏è Admin panel for managing users, projects, and viewing analytics (admin users only).
tourAdminDashboard: ‚öôÔ∏è Admin dashboard for managing users, projects, and viewing platform analytics. Full control over the platform.
tourCompleteMessage:
üéâ Congratulations! You've completed the CodeFolio tour. You now know all the features:

‚úÖ Navigation and theme switching
‚úÖ Project browsing and filtering
‚úÖ User profiles and following
‚úÖ Project creation and management
‚úÖ Comments and voting system

Start exploring and building your developer portfolio!
